report.title: Reference output for an import
report.description: Basic output of a reference range calculation based on an import.
report.query: select #columns# from ( select *, percent_rank() over (order by passes_summed) as percentile from ( select import_guid, location_name, entered_sref_system, easting, northing, date_start, taxa_taxon_list_id, entered_sref, autogenerated, pass_definition_id, detector_make_id, detector_model, detector_height_m, roost_within_25m, activity_elevated_by_roost, roost_species, linear_feature_adjacent_id, linear_feature_25m_id, anthropogenic_feature_adjacent_id, anthropogenic_feature_25m_id, temperature_c, rainfall_id, wind_speed_mph, method_of_classification, analysis_software_used, site_name, max(passes_summed) as passes_summed from ecobat_occurrences o where 1=1 #filters# group by import_guid, location_name, entered_sref_system, easting, northing, date_start, taxa_taxon_list_id, entered_sref, autogenerated, pass_definition_id, detector_make_id, detector_model, detector_height_m, roost_within_25m, activity_elevated_by_roost, roost_species, linear_feature_adjacent_id, linear_feature_25m_id, anthropogenic_feature_adjacent_id, anthropogenic_feature_25m_id, temperature_c, rainfall_id, wind_speed_mph, method_of_classification, analysis_software_used, site_name ) as sub ) as fullset join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=fullset.taxa_taxon_list_id join cache_termlists_terms tpassdef on tpassdef.id=fullset.pass_definition_id left join cache_termlists_terms tdetectmake on tdetectmake.id=fullset.detector_make_id left join cache_termlists_terms tlinfeatadj on tlinfeatadj.id=fullset.linear_feature_adjacent_id left join cache_termlists_terms tlinfeat25m on tlinfeat25m.id=fullset.linear_feature_25m_id left join cache_termlists_terms tanthfeatadj on tanthfeatadj.id=fullset.anthropogenic_feature_adjacent_id left join cache_termlists_terms tanthfeat25m on tanthfeat25m.id=fullset.anthropogenic_feature_25m_id left join cache_termlists_terms train on train.id=fullset.rainfall_id where fullset.import_guid='#input_import_guid#' and fullset.autogenerated=false and 88 in (#website_ids#) -- ensure permissions OK

param.name: filter_spatial_km
param.description: Number of km of radius to limit the reference set to.

param.name: filter_date
param.description: Limit to records +/- 30 days of the input

param.name: filter_temp
param.description: Limit to records +/- 2deg of the input

param.name: filter_wind
param.description: Limit to records +/- 2mph of the input

param.name: filter_pass_definition
param.display: Limit to the same pass definition
param.description: Limit to records which have the same pass definition as those in the import

param.name: input_doy_from
param.description: First day of year (0-364/5) in the imported records list to compare against

param.name: input_doy_to
param.description: Last day of year (0-364/5) in the imported records list to compare against

param.name: input_x
param.description: Average easting value being fed into the analysis

param.name: input_y
param.description: Average northing value being fed into the analysis

param.name: input_temp_low
param.description: Lowest temperature at sunset for range of records being input into the report in degC

param.name: input_temp_high
param.description: Highest temperature at sunset for range of records being input into the report in degC

param.name: input_wind_low
param.description: Lowest wind speed at sunset for range of records being input into the report in mph

param.name: input_wind_high
param.description: Highest wind speed at sunset for range of records being input into the report in mph

param.name: input_pass_definition_ids
param.description: Comma separated IDs of the pass definitions used for records being input into the report

param.name: include_autogenerated
param.description: Should autogenerated higher taxon data be included

column.name: activity_level
column.sql: case when max(fullset.percentile)<0.2 then 'low' when max(fullset.percentile)<0.4 then 'low/medium' when max(fullset.percentile)<0.6 then 'medium' when max(fullset.percentile)<0.8 then 'medium/high' else 'high' end

column.name: roost_within_25m
column.sql: case fullset.roost_within_25m when true then 'Yes' else 'No' end

column.name: activity_elevated_by_roost
column.sql: case fullset.activity_elevated_by_roost when true then 'Yes' else 'No' end

column.name: reference_range_size
column.sql: (select count( distinct coalesce(location_name, '') || entered_sref_system || easting::text || northing::text || date_start::text || taxa_taxon_list_id::text || entered_sref || autogenerated::text || pass_definition_id::text || detector_make_id::text || detector_model || coalesce(detector_height_m::text, '') || roost_within_25m::text || activity_elevated_by_roost::text || coalesce(roost_species, '') || coalesce(linear_feature_adjacent_id::text, '') || coalesce(linear_feature_25m_id::text, '') || coalesce(anthropogenic_feature_adjacent_id::text, '') || coalesce(anthropogenic_feature_25m_id::text, '') || coalesce(temperature_c::text, '') || coalesce(rainfall_id::text, '') || coalesce(wind_speed_mph::text, '') || coalesce(method_of_classification::text, '') || coalesce(analysis_software_used::text, '') || coalesce(site_name::text, '')) from ecobat_occurrences where external_key=cttl.external_key #filters#)
